dmca.title: Not Everything is Fair Game: Game-Reserve Requests Website to Remove Infringing Mater
dmca.body:
[Address] Cape Town, South Africa.
Tel: [Private]	
Fax: [Private]
E-mail: [Private]
15 February 2005
Google, Inc. 
[Phone]
Attn: [Recipient]
Dear Google

DCMA complaint against www.south-african-lodges.com
I wish to lodge a complaint against the above website for copying verbatim from my site, www.game-reserve.com, a total of 4779 words and replicating them on 8 different pages, which are identical to the copy on 10 pages on www.game-reserve.com.
As a result of this, www.South-African-Lodges.com has gained very valuable placing in google SERPS, and is clearly using the content to drive customers to its site and thereby generate revenue, as well as to appear to be an authoritative source of reference, to the detriment of our company which developed www,game-reserve.com and its entire contents. Our site is copyrighted on every page, and the historical claim to the content on www.game-reserve.com can be validated at the Web Archive (http://www.archive.orq).
Details of the infringements as follows:
1. Affected 10 affected URL's on www.game-reserve.com are:

(i) http://www.game-reserve.com/south-africa_kruger-park.html 
(ii) http://www.game-reserve.com/south-africa_sabi-sands.html 
(iii) http://www.game-reserve.com/south-africa_st-lucia.html
(iv)	http://www.game-reserve.com/south-africa_phinda.htrnl
(v)	http://www,game-reserve.com/south-africa_addo.html
(vi)	http://www.game-reserve.com/south-africa_garden-route.html
(vii)	http://www.game-reserve.com/south-africa_cedarberg.html
(viii)	http://www.game-reserve.com/south-africa_pilanesberg.html
(ix)	http://www.game-reserve.com/south-africa_welgevonden.htmi
(x)	http://www.game-reserve.com/south-africa_madikwe.html

2. The copyrighted work at issue is the text appearing at the followirg 8 URL's on www.south-african-lodges.com:
(i). http://www.south-african-lodges.com/area-kruger-national-park.php
444 words & matching text, copied verbatim.
(ii)	http://www.south-african-lodges.com/area-kruger-national-park.php
971 words & matching text, copied verbatim.
(iii)	http://www.south-african-lodges.com/area-kwazulu-natal.php 316 words & matching text, copied verbatim.
(iv). http://www.south-african-lodges.com/area-kwazulu-natal.php
278 words & matching text, copied verbatim.
(v)	http://www.south-african-lodges.com/area-eastern-cape.php
575 words & matching text, copied verbatim.
(vi)	http://www.south-african-lodges.com/area-garden-route.php 752 words & matching text, copied verbatim.
(vu). http://www.south-african-lodges.com/area-cederberg-karoo.php 589 words & matching text, copied verbatim.
(viii)	http://www.south-african-lodges.com/area-sun-city.php
473 words & matching text, copied verbatim.
(ix)	http://www.south-african-lodges.com/area-waterberg-
